name: Invasion early access
description:
Summary:

Alien's have sent robots known as "Xbots" down to earth to exterminate all living things so they can re-populate it with their own species, you must fend off these high tech alien fiends before it's too late!

This is my first game, its short and took longer then it should've (about 4 months to develop) but I didn't get to work on it as much as I would have liked since I was too busy, but it's done now!

This is only an alpha build (its very early access) and whether it becomes more than that or not is up to you! Try to imagine what the game could be with more time and hard work.

If you would like to see big improvements and more missions in the future (and trust me I have BIG plans) then please leave feedback, your ideas, and support the game.

Please report any bugs here or using the in game bug reporter. Enjoy!

Sound effects by: Seth Salazar
Music by: Anthony Lowski

Controls:

W | A | S | D SPACE SHIFT F TAB ESC MouseScroll/1|2|3 keys

Check out UnoWayGames on twitter
